This slate-gray garment ripples with necromantic energy. When worn properly, this magical bodysuit transforms the appearance of a living creature into that of an undead creature and grants a +3 item bonus to Stealth checks.

Activateâ€”Necrotize 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Duration 1 hour (see text)

Effect The shredskin transforms your appearance into an undead version of yourself. Your disguise affects your visual appearance, sound, scent, and all other forms of detection, including lifesense. After the normal duration of this ability ends, you can extend it by 1 more hour by piercing yourself with hooks on the robe, causing you to lose @Damage[50[healing]] Hit Points. The duration can't be extended a second time, and if these Hit Points are healed, the effect ends immediately.
